SELECT COUNT(*) as COUNT FROM "ORDER" O JOIN PAYMENT USING(IMP_UID) JOIN PRODUCT USING(PRODUCT_ID) WHERE USER_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_IMG, START_DATE, END_DATE, MERCHANT_UID, PAY_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY O.MERCHANT_UID DESC) AS RNUM FROM "ORDER" O JOIN PAYMENT USING(IMP_UID) JOIN PRODUCT USING(PRODUCT_ID) WHERE USER_NO = ?) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT USER_NAME, P.PRODUCT_ID AS PRODUCT_ID, P.PRODUCT_NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME, P.START_DATE AS START_DATE, P.END_DATE AS END_DATE, Y.STATUS AS STATUS, B.BH_CLASS AS BH_CLASS, B.PRICE AS PRICE, P.A_PRICE AS A_PRICE, O.CHILD AS CHILD, O.POINT_U AS POINT_U, O.FINAL_PAY AS FINAL_PAY, O.FLIGHT AS FLIGHT, CONCAT(PERSON.SURNAME, PERSON.ENG_NAME) AS NAME, PERSON.BIRTHDAY AS BIRTHDAY, PERSON.PASSPORT AS PASSPORT, Y.PAY_OP AS PAY_OP, Y.TOTAL_PAY AS TOTAL_PAY FROM "ORDER" O JOIN "USER" U ON O.USER_NO = U.USER_NO JOIN PRODUCT P ON O.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID JOIN BOHUM B ON O.BH_NO = B.BH_NO JOIN PAYMENT Y ON Y.IMP_UID = O.IMP_UID JOIN PERSON ON O.MERCHANT_UID = PERSON.MERCHANT_UID WHERE U.USER_NO = ? AND P.PRODUCT_ID = ? AND PERSON.STATUS = 'A'
